QuestData.Title: Locked and Loaded
QuestData.Description: $n, come in. Can you read me?$b$bThe battle is about to start. I hope you've delivered all of those packages.$b$bI need you here in Morgan's Vigil, NOW.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Get back to Morgan's Vigil ASAP!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Colonel Troteman at Morgan's Vigil in Burning Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: $n's here! We can get started.$b$bThis is our big moment, $n. I hope you brought your A game.
